title: Apple Car to enter production by 2020, report claims | Trusted Reviews
description: ![applecarplay]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * **Related:** [iPhone 6S releasedate](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/iphone-6s-release-date-rumours-news-specs-and-price)But could Apple realistically enter the automotive industry? Well it certainlyhas the spare capital to try. Last quarter saw the tech giant post [a worldrecord profit of $18 billion](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/apple-smashes-its-all-time-record-with-74-5m-iphone-sales), while the firm’s cashreserves are known to be in excess of $178 billion (£116bn).It’s also important to remember that Apple typically avoids being the first tomarket for various product categories. Other companies beat Apple to the punchwith smartphones, tablets, portable music players, and smartwatches.This means that Apple could look to rectify mistakes made by Tesla and otherelectric car manufacturers. Tesla plans to launch a new electric car in 2017.Apple has already dipped its tow in the automotive market too, having launchedits [CarPlay dashboard interface](https://www.trustedreviews.com/apple-carplay-review). It’s likely an actual Apple Car would see this systemintegrated.
